survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Autonomous Vehicle Rides
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users who have experienced rides in autonomous vehicles to assess satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with your most recent autonomous vehicle ride?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement of satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with your most recent autonomous vehicle ride?

questions.question_text: What aspects of the autonomous vehicle ride did you find most satisfactory? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Communication from the vehicle (e.g., alerts, updates)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture varied positive experiences.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkboxes (multi-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What aspects of the autonomous vehicle ride did you find most satisfactory? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Communication from the vehicle (e.g., alerts, updates)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future autonomous vehicle rides?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future autonomous vehicle rides?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use an autonomous vehicle ride service again in the next 3 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood of future usage.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use an autonomous vehicle ride service again in the next 3 months?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend autonomous vehicle rides to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge word-of-mouth potential.

script.question_text: Would you recommend autonomous vehicle rides to a friend or colleague?
